Authors:
siska arie santy siahaan, Iman Hidayat, Kartini
Kramadibrata, Jamjan Meeboon, Susumu Takamatsu
Title:
Podosphaera perseae-americanae, a new powdery mildew species
on Persea americana (avocado) from Indonesia
Keywords:
Anamorph, Cystotheceae, Erysiphaceae, Molecular phylogeny,
Taxonomy
Abstract:
An asexual stage of powdery mildew was found on Persea
americana in West Java and North Sumatera, Indonesia. Based on
phylogenetic analyses of the 28S rRNA gene and ITS region as well as
morphological investigations, a new species, Podosphaera
perseae-americanae, is proposed for this fungus including detailed
descriptions and illustrations of morphological and a discussion of its
generic affinity and phylogeny.
